title: [Creative Discussion] If you could create your own champion, what would you make?
body:
For a long time I have had so many different champion concepts, but I never seem to be able to finish them in terms of what each of their abilities are. So I was curious to see what thematic, or gameplay style, and etc you wish you could see be added in the game.

So let's see what you all have on your minds...

###Things to consider:

* Champion Theme
* Champion Playstyle
* Champion Personality
* Champion Visuals
* Champion Role
